TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_nipaluma-bedadaki, title = nipaluma-bedadaki, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-bedadaki} }

S.FORM: == bedadaki == 伏地蝙蝠草 u cacay a mihca ku uzip, takalaw maka 60-60mm, sibanuh amin i kidu. u duut-sumanahay. caay kayadah ku balu. manamuh i tebal nu nanum. u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay

== bedadaki == 伏地蝙蝠草 o cacay a mihca ko ozip, takalaw maka 60-60mm, sibanoh amin i kido. o doot-somanahay. caay kayadah ko balo. manamoh i tebal no nanom. o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay
